prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

conbody.p: In producing this document we processed and backed up our files daily or sometimes even more than once a day.

We did not use a library (source control) system or content management system, but now that the project has grown to 300+ files, we are investigating systems that will meet our needs with future editions of this document and other DITA projects.
